titles.title: A bill to amend the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act to provide further self-governance by Indian Tribes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Hoeven without amendment. With written report No. 116-34.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 73.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee for Indigenous Peoples of the United States.

committee.subcommittee: Indigenous Peoples of the United States
committee.name: House Natural Resources
